description:
cmd/go: fix partial directory replace

Instead of replacing goroot with $GOROOT, the method fmtcmd now uses
goroot+os.PathSeparator.

It could use ${GOROOT} instead of $GOROOT, but it would still
produce an erroneous script, with the path ${GOROOT}stuff/src/... It
works, but does not seem to be correct.

Fixes issue 3279.
